css: .about1 a{color:#e03a3c;);text-decoration:none;transition:.3s}.about1 a:hover{color:color-mix(in srgb,#e03a3c;),transparent 25%);text-decoration:none}.about1 h1,.about1 h2,.about1 h3,.about1 h4,.about1 h5,.about1 h6{color:#fff;}@keyframes php-email-form-loading{0%{transform:rotate(0)}100%{transform:rotate(360deg)}}@keyframes pulsate-play-btn{0%{transform:scale(.6,.6);opacity:1}100%{transform:scale(1,1);opacity:0}}@media screen and (max-width:768px){[data-aos-delay]{transition-delay:0!important}}.about1.section,section.about1{color:#ffffff;background-color:#1b1b1b;padding:60px 0;scroll-margin-top:100px;overflow:clip}.about1.section-bg{background-color:transparent;padding:160px 0;position:relative}.about1.section-bg:before{content:"";background-color:#1b1b1b;position:absolute;bottom:60px;top:60px;left:0;right:0;transform:skewY(-3deg)}.about1.section-bg .container{position:relative}@media (max-width:1199px){.about1.section,.about1section{scroll-margin-top:66px}}.about1 .content h3{font-weight:700;font-size:34px;margin-bottom:30px}.about1 .content p{margin-bottom:30px}.about1 .content .about-btn{padding:8px 30px 9px 30px;color:var(#ffffff);border-radius:50px;transition:.3s;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:600;font-size:13px;display:inline-flex;align-items:center;border:2px solid #e03a3c;)}.about1 .content .about-btn i{font-size:16px;padding-left:5px}.about1 .content .about-btn:hover{background:#e03a3c;);color:#fff}.about1 .icon-box i{font-size:40px;color:#e03a3c;);margin-bottom:10px}.about1 .icon-box h4{font-size:20px;font-weight:700;margin:0 0 10px 0}.about1 .icon-box h4 a{color:#fff;transition:.3s}.about1 .icon-box p{font-size:15px;color:color-mix(in srgb,var(#ffffff),transparent 40%);margin-bottom:0}.about1 .icon-box:hover h4 a{color:#e03a3c;)}.about1 .gy-4 img{width: 80px;height:auto; margin-bottom: 20px}
